title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Advanced Mathematical Problem-Solving PBL Workshop for Corporate Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of linear algebra, probability theory, and statistics, with practical data interpretation experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain in three or more steps the procedure for converting practical problem situations into mathematical modeling.
Learners can design complex mathematical problems in teams and derive solutions using PBL techniques.
Learners can present two or more strategies for applying mathematical reasoning processes to solve language domain problems.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
